metadata.name: Disabled MFA to Bypass Authentication Mechanisms
metadata.comment: Detection for when multi factor authentication has been disabled, which might indicate a malicious activity to bypass authentication mechanisms.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('azureactivedirectory') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('disable strong authentication.') AND lower(actor.authorizations.decision) = lower('success'))

output.summary: Detection for when multi factor authentication has been disabled, which might indicate a malicious activity to bypass authentication mechanisms.

metadata.objective: False positive: Authorized modification by administrators Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/authentication/howto-mfa-userstates
